verbs.description: While it [V: may] seem like a trump card for a Calvinism debate , with careful exegesis of the text , we see that 2 Peter 3:9 does n’t negate Calvinism at all . Instead , it ’s a beautiful text that speaks to the patience of our Lord and the promise of salvation for His church .
